alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 21 at 9:47AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following counties, Phillips and Valley. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 947 AM MDT, satellite estimates indicate snowmelt in the advisory area. This will cause small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Glasgow, Malta, Opheim, Whitewater, Nashua, Saco, Dodson, Hinsdale, Tampico, St. Marie, Port Of Opheim, Loring, Port Of Morgan, Frazer, Lustre, Frenchman Reservoir, Vandalia, Thoeny, Sleeping Buffalo and Bowdoin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
